channel.title: Rblx on Anaminus.Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rblx on Anaminus.Blog

item.title: RBXM to RBXMX
item.content:encoded:
If you’re having trouble getting rbxmk to covert rbxm to rbxmx correctly, it’s probably to do with Roblox’s API dump missing certain serialized properties. I’ve created a patch file that will add such properties back to the dump.

https://github.com/Anaminus/rbxmk/tree/imperative/doc/examples/dump-patch
